level.heading: Rules and regulations for implementation of subchapter.
Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90-day) addition of §§ 31-2451 to 31-2454 [1981 Ed.], see §§ 2 to 5 of the Attendance and School Safety Emergency Act of 2000 (D.C. Act 13- 319, April 17, 2000, 47 DCR 2882).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 10-55, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 38-631.
